63298.summary: Some customers in the Vickers Heights area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63298.title: June 29 - Thunder Bay (Vickers Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
